website_summaries.verdict: Experienced welders are extremely satisfied with the performance and reliability of this MIG welder, which handles heavier-grade metals with relative ease.
pros: Lays down steel bead perfectly, owners say
Included wire feed is stable and steady and provides the added bonus of welding aluminum
Smooth welding process, with plenty of heat as needed, and a absolutely reliable arc, users say
Holds up well under heavy daily use
cons: Included spool feeder doesn’t work with all sizes of wire
Torch cable is too stiff for some users
A few owners feel the welder runs too hot

customer_reviews.title: I love this Mig welder. Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Mig welder for small home projects or even for a shop. I've been a welder for 12 years now and am very happy with this welder. I rebuild cars for as a hobby on my off season and I've welded 22 gauge sheet metal and 3/8" steel with this welder. The settings that the chart recommends are spot on. Like I said, I love it and would definitely recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim Kryshtal

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine..
customer_reviews.text: This welder is awesome. Had a Hobart 220V years back that didn't disappoint and neither did this one. Never used a spool gun and haven't yet so I can't review that. I run argon mix with non-flux .030 wire for beautiful welds on a lot of 11 gauge metal pipe. 20 PSI on the gas and I get "0" spatter.
customer_reviews.author: Steve,  the man...

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. Done a few projects with it so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Done a few projects with it so far. I somewhat question the tuning of the voltage settings. When setting it to the noted setting on the chart per the steel thickness it seems to be welding a bit hot and on some thinner stuff I blow threw threw it and need to dial down a bit further. This is a bit of a problem on the thin stuff as you have to slow down some which exposes it to heat longer and can warp the steel if you're not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: easy use good pic
customer_reviews.text: easy to use i welded first time the day i got it small and compact welded tractor blade and had good results welded with hook to my generater 6000 good results came with spool runner works good with aluminum just ad shielding gas i never new welding was so easy ..hobart works great
customer_reviews.author: handfree

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is not worth anything
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this 18 months ago started having problems called Hobart was told everything was covered for 3 years except gun . Was told to take it to their authorized service center after a nearly 3week wait was told it would be $385. For replacement of contactor . That should have been under warranty. Cheaply made china crap. Just my opinion I sold it and will not buy Hobart anything
customer_reviews.author: greg howell

customer_reviews.title: Dead right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this welder didn’t work. Took the cabinet apart and immediately saw that the input power was not connected. I attached it then the welder worked fine. The wire fit was tight when connected so this didn’t happen during shipment. What happened to Hobart Quality department?
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great welder. Learned on this model and have completed ...
customer_reviews.text: Great welder. Learned on this model and have completed multiple hobby jobs around the house and in my shop.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cellini

customer_reviews.title: Compare to miller
customer_reviews.text: Set up was a breeze, welder seems well made. Just used today after set up and it welds perfect. Using oem wire, the welds it lays out are perfect, wire spool system works nicely and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Dmar

customer_reviews.title: Great welder
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition. Read some of the other reviews but I have not had any issues with mine at all. No dents or anything. It functions perfectly. Spool gun also works great.
customer_reviews.author: Edmond

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: You better have a good back to lift this thing. Pure weight and an excellent welder. Right out of the box and in 5 min. it's ready for serious welding. Get a cart or make one first thing. You will need it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Limitada

customer_reviews.title: Nice medium size welder...
customer_reviews.text: So far very good. Price was very good. Welder did not work when I got it but customer service toll free number had me up and running in no time. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Amazing welder buy if it fits your needs you won’t be disappointed in peformance it dose exactly what it says it will do flawless
customer_reviews.author: Collins

customer_reviews.title: 'Hobart Handler 500554001 190 with SpoolRunner 100
customer_reviews.text: So far it works great. I'm just a diy'er but it's easy to use and does 80% of my welding . Now I only need the arch welder on the really big stuff. I haven't used the spool gun yet but a few projects are coming up. I used a 110v (snap on) and this is much better. A bit pricey but I like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome welder!
customer_reviews.text: Great welder,bought for spoolgun works great! just have to have patients with feeding wire in spoolgun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frenchy

customer_reviews.title: Hobart Handler can get the job done, if you can write with a pen you can weld with this MIG
customer_reviews.text: Don't get a smaller welder, you will never enjoy welding if you do. Check out the used welders they are mostly 110 volt units.The 190 is a good home or farm use welder and the spool gun will come in handy at some point. Buy 2 tanks one for steel(25% CO2, 75% Argon ) the second for aluminum (100% Argon shielding gas), get the cart and as good a helmet as you can afford. Have fun
customer_reviews.author: M. lyn

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Lots of shopping around. Best price for a great product
customer_reviews.author: Cody S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: New to welding and I was laying beads within an hour
customer_reviews.author: Josh hostler

customer_reviews.title: Good Welder for Novice to Intermediate
customer_reviews.text: It did not disappoint me. My welding has improved from using this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice welder
customer_reviews.text: Awesome welder. Welding is smooth. Had a wire that was disconnected inside when i got it. It wouldn't feed the wire. Hooked it backed up and I was in business. Ground clamp needs replaced with a bigger better one but the one that comes with it will suffice. Spoolrunner is great too
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great welder.
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend this to any home professional or a small shop. Good wire feed consistency the regulator works great and it has plenty of power. I've welded 1/2 a36 with full penetration. The spool runner is also great, remember you will need a different shielding gas for aluminum than for steel. Only complaint is the ground clamp was a little cheap. Easily replaced for about 30 dollars. though.
customer_reviews.author: canoer79

customer_reviews.title: Great welder. I wish I would have bought these ...
customer_reviews.text: Great welder. I wish I would have bought these items sooner. Expensive, but you get what you pay for. Very smooth welder, love it.
customer_reviews.author: tnq5546

customer_reviews.title: Don’t but the used or refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Bought the slightly used one it showed up smashed and missing parts of you want one but the new one with the warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like cheating, almost.
customer_reviews.text: Never done this type of welding before, though I've done tig, stick, and gas in the past. With gas... This is litterally so easy that a 'trained ape' could manage it (assuming said ape is able to read and follow the supplied instructions) Have not tried flux-core yet, nor have I attempted to assemble any of the dozen or so projects I have planned - those wait on funds to purchase the needed materials. However, getting penetration and more-or-less complete fusion was a very strarightforward manner.
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Novice at welding but machine handled my 1/4 steel plate with no problems. Easy set up, think it will serve all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES EARLY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent welder. Handles everything that I do
customer_reviews.text: Excellent welder. Handles everything that I do, from farm tractor frames to thin metal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Joe Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy an inverter welder
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic mig welder. It's consistent, heavy duty and boy it can weld some thick steel. I've been using it every day for 10 hours a day for over six months now and it hasn't had a hiccup yet. The only thing I should mention is that the drive roller doesn't work with .023 wire so keep that in mind. Even though you can flip it around, it never pushes the wire through. The correct roller for .023 wire is Hobart 237338. You can find it on Amazon by searching Hobart 237338.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT AND CAME WITH SPOOL GUN I WOULD BUY THIS ...
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS BECAUSE I WANTED A MAJOR COMPANY BACKING IT, 5 YEAR WAR. WORKS GREAT AND CAME WITH SPOOL GUN I WOULD BUY THIS AGAIN, PLENTY OF POWER FOR MY HOME SHOP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a good mid sized welder.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great welder for most projects such as auto restoration. I prefer using it with argon as opposed to flux core wire. welds are very clean. I have welded 5/16 steel and the penetration was very good. I have also used it on body panels and it works fine for that.
customer_reviews.author: Enzo

customer_reviews.title: welder worked great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: welder worked great out of the box, really nice welds. Follow the chart for temp and speed and they will be beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Jana C.

customer_reviews.title: Great little welderr
customer_reviews.text: Pulled it out of the box, hooked it up to a tank and got to work. This little fella has not flinched
customer_reviews.author: Donny D

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This welder works well for small jobs. Have not used the spool gun yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product but I found the exact same machine at tractor supply for 100.00 less,
customer_reviews.author: Robert Burns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Welder so far. Have not used the gas options yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little welding package! I really enjoy welding in the shop with this guy. If you need more functionality than the 190, the 210 mvp works great because you can switch from 120 to 220 in a few seconds. Hobart welders are American made and much less than its American made competitors
customer_reviews.author: J112575

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I weld for a livin, and this machine surprised me. I've used it to fix aluminum dump trailers and exhaust systems, runs great have no problems. The only thkng I'd like to see changed is the voltage settings from click into place to free spin like the wire speed other than that great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: zak reininger

customer_reviews.title: buy, buy-you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best welder ever highly recommend that you purchase
customer_reviews.author: ken wozunk

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased so far
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased so far. Haven't used it a lot but enough to know it welds very good. The spool gun looks well built and works very good. Only disappointment is the spool gun is made in China. The main reason I bought a Hobart was to buy an USA made welder.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C.

customer_reviews.title: Great mig for me.
customer_reviews.text: This unit was able to handle every job I used it for. I made an extension for it so I could roll it around the garage. Easy maintenance and easy set up. I've had the Handler 190 for over a year, from repair jobs to fabrication. I would recomend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: AG Staks

customer_reviews.title: stop debating....
customer_reviews.text: I was very close to going with a couple other cheaper setups.... Im very happy with this and glad I went with a hobart. This thing is solid, strong, compact, and great value. I looked into other companys such as eastwood, everlast, and longevity but decided to go with this tried and true machine. Dont hesitate to pay a little more for alot more quality. I was not able able to operate the hobart 190 but was able to operate the eastwood and longevity competitors before hand and imo it isnt even a competition at all now that I got this and I have ran all three. The cheaper ones are just that.....
customer_reviews.author: JAMES D LITTLE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine. I love welding with it.
customer_reviews.author: michael lowell dyer

customer_reviews.title: Hobart equipment is very good and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Hobart equipment is very good and worth the price. My father taught me to stick weld when I was in the 4th grade. That was long before MIG welders were available. This machine makes it so easy. I also have a 140 that my son uses on his farm with flux core. The 190 is a 220v only design but having welded with both, the 190 using 220 volts is better for a shop. My son uses the 140 with a 5KW generator and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Research Team

customer_reviews.title: Excellent welder. Spool gun works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent welder. Spool gun works great. Like the infinite adjustment for wire feeder
customer_reviews.author: signs

customer_reviews.title: Hobart Handler 190 with SpoolRunner 100
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Lincoln 115v welder and I have a Fire Power 240v stick welder. I must say I love this HH 190. Much more penetration and cleaner welds than the Lincoln. I also love the fact that I no longer need to run flux core wire. I run C25 and solid wire and my welds look great with great penetration. If your on the fence about this welder, don't be. You will love it. I've never welded aluminum but with this machine and the SpoolRunner 100 you have the ability to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: Hank & Steph

customer_reviews.title: hobart 190 welder
customer_reviews.text: Awsome welder for the price. Exceeded my expectations welds flawless beads thanks amazon for a quality product
customer_reviews.author: dennis wertz jr

customer_reviews.title: Rebirth of lost skills
customer_reviews.text: I had a Lincoln welder and was satisfied, a few feeding problems, but it worked. I went shopping to step our game to welding aluminum, and the Hobart is WAY better. Got it and it works every day. Even have the ladies welding. Getting a alum gun was a bonus, bought the Hobart electronic helmet and Hobart gloves (softest and best fitting gloves ever) and now we have two new "want to be welders". Note, this crew never "played with the lincoln that is still sitting in the corner. So far we are jam free and making sparks.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome welder
customer_reviews.text: I received this welder in great time and I love it. Welds beautifully and I cant wait to start some welding pojects and try out the spoolgun too.
customer_reviews.author: alexander crosby

customer_reviews.title: My New Toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will come back to add for operational review... but at present it arrived early and in-store condition. Looks great can't wait to use.
customer_reviews.author: BigCountry

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Welder
customer_reviews.text: Built like a small tank, spoolrunner is great and doesn't kink aluminum wire, large noisy fans (so you know it's running cool), and full set of gas accessories make this monster a steal. This is the most power you can get in this form factor, so instead of crying about 2-3 amps less than an Ironman or Millermatic sit back and enjoy the extra shop space. As an aside, I don't know who makes the guts, but I know they're made in America. Furthermore, the drive roll is *very* well-made and you can feel the precision when adjusting the tension. I absolutely love this thing.... now to fab a custom bumper for my suburban tank.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the welder
customer_reviews.text: Love the welder, not impressed with the gun, the hose way to stiff, bought an hip flex gun, all better
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: very good welder for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because $818 with spool gun was a good deal. this thing welds like nothing I have ever used. the most stable arc I have ever seen. welds out of position awesome. I like this thing like no other mig welder I have ever used, the duty cycle is low to weld hard, but for average home use, this thing is great. I cannot believe how this thing will weld. well worth $818. if you want an inexpensive home welder, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: jdfromil

customer_reviews.title: Short power cord!
customer_reviews.text: Does not have 10ft power cord as stated, more like 5.5 ft. I will have to purchase a $70 extension cord to use. Tensioner control was installed with the markings in the back were they could not be see. Included sample wire is very very small amount. Not a very good start!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder for the price.
customer_reviews.text: recommend it to anyone needing a good reliable easy to move welder for home/hobby work, easy change on spool gun and it works great also.
customer_reviews.author: DLJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Machine!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this welder because it was time to buy a new one. I have owned a Hobart Handler 120 for 22 years and it has always worked. I have built a lot of stuff with the 120. The 190 is awesome and the spool gun is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Douglass P. Lendahl

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this welder and to my surprise I received i the next day and i am out in the sticks. I hooked it up and tested it and it is so easy to weld with and hooked the spool gun up and tried the aluminium and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Reed

customer_reviews.title: "IT'S ALL GOOD. THANKS.
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO SET UP....DIRECTIONS AND DIAGRAMS FOLLOWABLE. SIMPLE PLUG AND PLAY OPERATION. ATTACHMENTS (GUN AND GROUND) NOT FLIMSY OR CHEAPLY MADE.
customer_reviews.author: william eubank

customer_reviews.title: Awesome welder
customer_reviews.text: I had the 135 before this. What a major upgrade!!! Much more adjustable and so much easier to use than the 135!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. As a relatively new welder
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. As a relatively new welder, this machine has really helped me increase my skill set. Have yet to use the spool gun but expect it to work fine if the welder itself is any indication.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Berringer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weider
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a 140 and machine preforms like a dream. I haven't had a chance to use the spoolgun but expect no trouble. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: handiman38

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect item description
customer_reviews.text: Bought this welder for a few projects. The description claims it's dual voltage 115v and 230v. Unfortunately, there is only a 230v plug and the manual doesn't show a capability for 115v. Very disappointed in the false advertisement....
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Setting #4 don't work. All other settings work. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: teresa eberline

customer_reviews.title: poor information over the item
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy, the device is not 50 HZ, is 60 hz and supposedly Should be 50 Hz, which is why I can not use it,
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Ladeira

product_meta.title: Hobart 500554001 Handler 190 with SpoolRunner 100
product_meta.description:
Style:WelderThis exceptional value pairs the Hobart Handler 190 Wire Feed Welder with a 10ft., 150 Amp Spool Gun, resulting in one powerful welding package. The Hobart Handler 190 is a powerful and portable wire-feed flux core and MIG welder designed to weld mild steel, flux core, aluminum and stainless steel. The generous operating parameters allow you to weld 24 ga. to 5/16 in. steel in a single pass. Plus it is perfect for the welder who wants to work on auto body, household repairs, or even heavier farm projects requiring extra power. With an arsenal of standard features such as 7 output voltage settings and a dual-groove quick change drive roll, the Handler 190 is as versatile as it is powerful.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Hobart Handler 190 MIG Wire Welder
Built with quality and durability in mind, the Handler 190 is a 230 volt wire welder with industrial performance. It easy to set and adjust for different materials, thicknesses and wires. The Handler 190 is backed by the Hobart 5/3/1 Industrial Warranty. Each unit is designed and manufactured in Troy, OH USA.
(image)
Handler 190 shown with included items
(image)
Aluminum welding repair using the Handler 190 with optional spool gun

Weld Aluminum with Optional SpoolRunner 100 Spool Gun
The Hobart Handler 190 is spool gun ready for welding aluminum. Directly plug-in the optional SpoolRunner 100 spool gun to eliminate feeding problems associated with aluminum wire welding. No additional control box or adapter is required to connect the SpoolRunner 100. A selector switch for MIG gun or spool gun operation makes switching guns quick and easy.

Easy to Set-up and Use
Just a few minutes for set-up and you are ready to weld. A weld set-up guide is included on the inside of the cover to set your welder properly.

For Welding Projects that Require More Power
Use the Handler 190 for welding auto body panels, exhaust systems, mower decks, trailer frames & hitches, tool carts, gun/bow racks, lawn & garden equipment, metal sculpture, farm equipment, fences and many other D-I-Y projects. Weld aluminum with the optional SpoolRunner 100 direct plug-in spool gun.

What’s Included in the Box?
Handler 190 with built-in gas valve, 10 ft. MIG gun, dual gauge regulator & gas hose, 10-ft work cable & clamp, 10-ft power cord, extra . 030 contact tips, sample spool of . 030 flux-cored wire, 8 inch spool adapter, owners manual and set-up guide. 500554001 also includes the SpoolRunner 100.
feature_bullets: Welds 24 ga. to 5/16in. steel in single pass
Powerful and Professional Results. Operates on 230V power
7 voltage selections, enhanced magnetics and infinite wire feed speed control offers easier fine control of the output parameters for improved arc performance with less spatter

specifications.Included Components: 10ft H100S4-10 gun, 10ft work cable with clamp, Built-in gas solenoid value and dual gauge regulator with gas hose, spool hub assembly accommodates 4 or 8 in. spools, sample spool of .030 in. self shielding flux-cored wire, .030 in. contact tips, power cord with plug, weld set-up chart, Owner's manual, SpoolRunner 100 - 10ft cable in plastic case.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
